to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: grml 1.0 and dectalk
body:
Interesting about the multiple attempts to get the DECTalk Express to
speak.  I have not heard that before.  I am afraid I do not have an
Express to experiment with, only a few friends with them but have not
been told about that problem.

  Kirk
